result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 6 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Bayesian Inference - Lecture Code: bayesian.R #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Ellison 2004. - Kery and Kellner Ch. 2, sections 2.7-2.10. - Background Reading (not required): - Hobbs and Hooten Ch5. ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Continue with: Bayesian Inference - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("rjags","bayesplot","rstanarm")) ``` ::: - Install External Software Program [JAGS](https://sourceforge.net/projects/mcmc-jags/files/) #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - [Bayes Quiz on Canvas](https://colostate.instructure.com/courses/193678/quizzes)
